meanings.definition: The branch of physics that deals with the interaction of magnetic fields and electrically conducting fluids.
meanings.sent1: Magnetohydrodynamics helps us understand how magnetic fields affect fluids.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use magnetohydrodynamics to study the behavior of conducting fluids in magnetic fields.
meanings.sent3: The magnetohydrodynamics class was electrifying, literally!
meanings.sent4: In the world of magnetohydrodynamics, magnetic fields dance with conducting fluids like partners in a cosmic tango.
meanings.sent5: The concept of magnetohydrodynamics is like a beautiful symphony of magnets and flowing liquids.

meanings.definition: The study of the behavior of electrically conducting fluids in the presence of magnetic fields.
meanings.sent1: Understanding magnetohydrodynamics is crucial for predicting fluid behavior in magnetic fields.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in magnetohydrodynamics observe how fluids react to magnetic fields.
meanings.sent3: The magnetohydrodynamics experiment turned into a colorful display of fluid dynamics.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of magnetohydrodynamics, fluids and magnetic fields engage in a captivating dance.
meanings.sent5: The study of magnetohydrodynamics paints a vivid picture of fluid movements under magnetic influence.
